channel.title: ASF JIRA
channel.description: This file is an XML representation of an issue

item.title: [HBASE-13086] Show ZK root node on Master WebUI
item.description: Currently we show a well-formed ZK quorum on the master webUI but not the root node. Root node can be changed based on deployment, so we should list it here explicitly. This information is helpful for folks playing around with phoenix.
item.summary: Show ZK root node on Master WebUI

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.

comments.comment:
-1 overall. Here are the results of testing the latest attachment
http://issues.apache.org/jira/secure/attachment/12700269/HBASE-13068.00.patch
against master branch at commit e405017a31a9253e5eecdd5cc2ba43ab182e16a0.
ATTACHMENT ID: 12700269

+1 @author. The patch does not contain any @author tags.

-1 tests included. The patch doesn't appear to include any new or modified tests.
Please justify why no new tests are needed for this patch.
Also please list what manual steps were performed to verify this patch.
+1 hadoop versions. The patch compiles with all supported hadoop versions (2.4.1 2.5.2 2.6.0)

+1 javac. The applied patch does not increase the total number of javac compiler warnings.

+1 javac. The applied patch does not increase the total number of javac compiler warnings.

+1 javadoc. The javadoc tool did not generate any warning messages.

-1 checkstyle. The applied patch generated 1938 checkstyle errors (more than the master's current 1936 errors).

+1 findbugs. The patch does not introduce any new Findbugs (version 2.0.3) warnings.

+1 release audit. The applied patch does not increase the total number of release audit warnings.

+1 lineLengths. The patch does not introduce lines longer than 100

+1 site. The mvn site goal succeeds with this patch.

-1 core tests. The patch failed these unit tests:

-1 core zombie tests. There are 1 zombie test(s): at org.apache.hadoop.hbase.client.TestMultipleTimestamps.testWithColumnDeletes(TestMultipleTimestamps.java:358)

Test results: https://builds.apache.org/job/PreCommit-HBASE-Build/12943//testReport/

Console output: https://builds.apache.org/job/PreCommit-HBASE-Build/12943//console

This message is automatically generated.

+1
Test failure in precommit can't be related.

HBASE-13086 Show ZK root node on Master WebUI (ndimiduk: rev 5631f7761b05b7ef4a509b3b006e39ab2be1b393)

FAILURE: Integrated in HBase-0.98-on-Hadoop-1.1 #829 (See https://builds.apache.org/job/HBase-0.98-on-Hadoop-1.1/829/)
HBASE-13086 Show ZK root node on Master WebUI (ndimiduk: rev 5631f7761b05b7ef4a509b3b006e39ab2be1b393)

  • hbase-client/src/main/java/org/apache/hadoop/hbase/zookeeper/ZooKeeperWatcher.java
  • hbase-server/src/main/jamon/org/apache/hadoop/hbase/tmpl/master/MasterStatusTmpl.jamon

This change may have introduced a regression in the 0.98 builds. See https://builds.apache.org/job/HBase-0.98/871/ and https://builds.apache.org/job/HBase-0.98-on-Hadoop-1.1/829/

java.lang.NullPointerException: null

	at org.apache.hadoop.hbase.tmpl.master.MasterStatusTmplImpl.renderNoFlush(MasterStatusTmplImpl.java:360)

	at org.apache.hadoop.hbase.tmpl.master.MasterStatusTmpl.renderNoFlush(MasterStatusTmpl.java:390)

	at org.apache.hadoop.hbase.tmpl.master.MasterStatusTmpl.render(MasterStatusTmpl.java:380)

	at org.apache.hadoop.hbase.master.TestMasterStatusServlet.testStatusTemplateWithServers(TestMasterStatusServlet.java:146)

We can fix it with an addendum, or revert and try again.
Sorry about that Andrew. I verified the master page locally... let me check again.
Patch for 0.98 that wires the mock object for both access paths to the ZooKeeperWatcher object.
This was the only related test that failed the 0.98 runs, so I've pushed. Thanks Andrew Purtell.

-1 overall. Here are the results of testing the latest attachment
http://issues.apache.org/jira/secure/attachment/12700839/HBASE-13086-0.98.addendum0.patch
against 0.98 branch at commit c651271f5759f39f282099999a50ab88a62d86b7.
ATTACHMENT ID: 12700839
